title: The Demon General of Earth (♀) Was Ridiculed as “The Weakest of the Four Heavenly Knights”, but After She Decided to Quit the Demon King’s Army and Lead a Slow Life, She Was Forced to Live With the Exiled Hero (♀) … Also, for Certain Reasons, They Got Married. - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Mecha   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Arranged Marriage   Cute Children   Doting Love Interests   Emotionally Weak Protagonist
author: 友情
description:
The Immortal Eldora of the Demon King’s Army was ridiculed as “the weakest of the Four Heavenly Knights.” After being defeated by a Hero and reaching her limit, she decides to quit and lead a Slow Life.

As she excitedly thought, “Now, it’s my fresh start!”, she’s visited by the same Hero that defeated her. After hearing that she was exiled from her country, they were then forced to live together.

These two who were originally enemies will live together and develop a bond with one another. It’s a slice-of-life story with such a theme. Also, they get married.>
